title: 106: Jordan Olds (Gwarsenio Hall): This Is the Thing We’re Gonna Keep Doing and It Feels Special
itunes:title: 106: Jordan Olds (Gwarsenio Hall): This Is the Thing We’re Gonna Keep Doing and It Feels Special
description:
This week Jeremy interviews Jordan Olds (Gwarsenio Hall) of Two Minutes to Late Night

On this episode Jordan and Jeremy talk parental advisory music, going to film school, filming behind the scenes tour footage for Bury Your Dead, connecting with comedy, Robert Rodriguez, learning how to play guitar, a disaster set at a battle of the bands, the journey of Two Minutes to Late Night and his relationship with Mutoid Man, how the at home cover songs started, and so much more!

SUBSCRIBE TO THE PATREON to hear a bonus episode where Jordan answered questions that were submitted by subscribers!

Follow the show on INSTAGRAM and TWITTER

Want some First Ever Podcast merch? Click here!
